# @lk/template Library

Template library for Shree Clinic Management System. Provides UI components, templates, and layout components that depend on @lk/core for signal-based communication.

## Installation

This library is distributed as a `.tgz` file. Install it in your project:

```bash
npm install file:common-libs/template.tgz
```

Or add to your `package.json`:

```json
{
  "dependencies": {
    "@lk/template": "file:common-libs/template.tgz",
    "@lk/core": "file:common-libs/core.tgz"
  }
}
```

Note: @lk/template depends on @lk/core, so make sure to install both.

## Usage

### TemplateModule

Import the TemplateModule in your app:

```typescript
import { NgModule } from '@angular/core';
import { TemplateModule } from '@lk/template';
import { CoreEventService } from '@lk/core';

@NgModule({
  imports: [TemplateModule],
  providers: [
    // Provide API_BASE_URL for @lk/core
    { provide: API_BASE_URL, useValue: 'https://www.doctech.solutions' }
  ]
})
export class AppModule { }
```

### Using Components

All template components are exported from the TemplateModule and can be used directly:

```html
<lk-sidebar></lk-sidebar>
<lk-header></lk-header>
```

## Building

To build this library:

```bash
ng build template --configuration=production
```

To pack as `.tgz`:

```bash
cd dist/projects/template
npm pack
mv template-*.tgz ../../../common-libs-archives/template.tgz
```

## Exports

All public APIs are exported from `src/public-api.ts`. See that file for the complete list of available exports.
